author: tocheng
body:
Hello,

the PR is to migrate the GTs in CMSSW release (autoCond) to 105X GTs,
and includes the most update data/MC conditions for ultra legacy preparation.
In addition, new GEM emap and PPS alignment and timing are included in data GTs.

### Offline data GT for run1 and run2
The updated GT is
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/105X_dataRun2_v4
Diff :
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/105X_dataRun2_v4/103X_dataRun2_v6

- New GEM eMap to support #25158 for new unpacker
- New PPS alignment and LHCInfo to support #25495 for PPS proton reconstruction
- New PPS timing correction to support #25858 to use timing in PPS local reconstruction
- New HCAL data condition announced in AlCa-hn :
   https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4075.html

### Offline relval data GT
The updated GT is
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/105X_dataRun2_v4
Diff :
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/105X_dataRun2_v4/103X_dataRun2_v6

- New GEM eMap to support #25158 for new unpacker
- New PPS alignment and LHCInfo to support #25495 for PPS proton reconstruction
- New PPS timing correction to support #25858 to use timing in PPS local reconstruction
- New HCAL data condition announced in AlCa-hn :
   https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4075.html
For 2016 MC GT,
the [updates](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/105X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v1/103X_mcRun2_asymptotic_v3) are [ES inter-calibration/pedestal](https://indico.cern.ch/event/791536/contributions/3288530/attachments/1782158/2899777/AlCaDB_21_01_2019.pdf) and [Hcal gain](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4075.html)

For 2017 MC GT,
the [updates](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/105X_mc2017_realistic_v2/103X_mc2017_realistic_v2) are [ECAL](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4085.html) and [HCAL](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4075.html) local recon conditions and respond correction and new [jet energy correction](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/JECDataMC#2017_Data)

For 2018 MC GT,
the [updates](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/105X_upgrade2018_realistic_v1/103X_upgrade2018_realistic_v8) are [ES inter-calibration/pedestal](https://indico.cern.ch/event/791536/contributions/3288530/attachments/1782158/2899777/AlCaDB_21_01_2019.pdf) and [HCAL](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4075.html) local recon conditions and respond correction and new pixel MC conditions and new [jet energy correction](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/JECDataMC#2017_Data)

In addition, for 2018, Run-3 and Phase-2 GTs,
labelled pixel quality tag is added to GT to support pixel digitizer development #25885
title: Update GT in CMSSW to 105X for ultra legacy
